recipes.title: Grilled Deviled Chickens Under a Brick
recipes.description: Grilling these chickens under a heavy weight will help them cook quickly and evenly, leaving them crisp and juicy.
ingredientLines: 4 baby chickens (poussins) 40 cornish hens (about 1 1/4 pounds each)

recipes.title: Stir-Fried Rice with Chinese Sausage
recipes.description: Коли шарми китайської кухні з хорошим у будь-якому стилі-фрай, мій приємним способом використовувати їх є в блюдо як noodle dish, з скромним цинамоновим впроу рослинний від пушини
ingredientLines: 2 або 3 лінки 3 chines sausage, вирізати в 1/4 inch slices
To garnish: finely chopped green onion or cilantro

recipes.title: Five-Spice Chicken Wings Recipe
recipes.description: Високий міст від китайського п'яти-шпика фарби не може бути, якщо ви були типовим міксіннам в термах іх incendiary wings, і кріктик шкура походить від blast of hot oven rather than splattering of hot oil.
ingredientLines: 40 chicken wing pieces, 40 20 whole chicken wings
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/3 to 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro leaves
Juice 1/2 lemon (або why not try lime?)

recipes.title: Korean Rice Cakes (Duk Boki)
recipes.description: Rice cake, known as duk in Korean, is chewy and soft. Combined with strong flavors and variations, no wonder Koreans eat them all the time.
ingredientLines: 6 to 8 fresh long rice cake sticks

recipes.title: Dump Cake
recipes.description: Don't let the name scare you. It's a really simple dessert with layers made at the base of a cake mix fluffed with some cherries and pineapple.
ingredientLines: 1 box (18 oz.) yellow or white cake mix
